com.samsung.android.sdk.composer

Class SpenComposerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.SpenComposerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SpenComposerView
extends View
    This class provides the methods for managing many contents (text, drawing, writing, image, web, etc).
    Since:
    5.0.0

        public void close()
        Close the composer view. Call this method before destroying the instance to prevent memory leaks.

        5.0.0

      • setCategoryName

        public boolean setCategoryName(String name)
        Set category name of current document
        Parameters:
        name - category name of current document
        Returns:
        true - if the category name set false - if the composer does not initialized or fail to set category name
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setLastModifiedTime

        public boolean setLastModifiedTime(String time)
        Set last modified time of current document
        Parameters:
        time - time string according to system time string setting
        Returns:
        true - if the last modified time set false - if the composer does not initialized or fail to set list modified time
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setContentHintText

        public boolean setContentHintText(String contentHintText)
        Sets the hint text to be displayed when the content of the composer has no the hint text
        Parameters:
        contentHintText - The hint text for empty content
        Returns:
        true - if the content hint text set false - if the composer does not initialized or fail to set content hint text
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setDocument

        public boolean setDocument(SpenSDoc doc)
        Set SpenSDoc document to this view. Support Limitation - Text of content & title does not support changing a font size even if SpenContentText has SpenTextSpan.TYPE_FONT_SIZE
        Parameters:
        doc - SpenSDoc document.
        Returns:
        true - if the document set to this view false - if the composer does not initialized or document is null or fail to set document to this view
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setFocus

        public void setFocus(SpenContentBase content)
        Set the focus to a content. Focus have to set to a content, do not allow multiple focus.
        Parameters:
        content - content will has focus
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • requestReadyForSave

        public void requestReadyForSave(boolean stopRecording)
        Request to wait saving handwriting and stop recording. Because the handwriting is saved async. so If you want to save the document, you have to wait until the handwriting is stored.
        Parameters:
        stopRecording - Set to true to stop recording for save, set to false do not stop recording even if recording works
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getFocusItem

        public SpenContentBase getFocusItem()
        Get focused item(content)
        Returns:
        focused content by setFocus(SpenContentBase)
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • scrollToCursor

        public void scrollToCursor()
        Set the cursor position of your view. This will cause a call to setScrollListener(SpenScrollListener)} and the view will be invalidated.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setPan

        public boolean setPan(float dy)
        Set the specified pan position and move to the position in the view.
        Parameters:
        dy - The pan position.
        Returns:
        true - if set pan succeed false - if the composer does not initialized or fail to set pan
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getPan

        public float getPan()

        Parameters:

        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setRichCanvasEnabled

        public void setRichCanvasEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable the rich canvas mode in pen toolbar of handwriting if enabled, we support AppendText and AppendImage icon. But AppendImage is necessary to implement in application. if clicked AppenImage button, it is called SpenActionListener.onVisibleImageSheet(boolean)
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable the rich canvas mode, set to false to disable the rich canvas mode.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • isRichCanvasEnabled

        public boolean isRichCanvasEnabled()
        Check if the rich canvas mode is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if rich canvas mode is enabled. false if rich canvas mode is not enabled.
        Since:
        5.0.0

        dataList - List of search data
        Since:
        5.0.0

        public void setActionLinkEnabled(boolean enable)

        Since:
